DOC.brief_summary: Dietary fiber consumption may contribute weight regulation improve satiety . In early study investigator find muffin contain resistant starch effective fiber alter satiety . The objective study determine 2 resistant starch consume muffin alter satiety whether mixture resistant starch effective either alone enhance satiety .
DOC.criteria: Healthy men woman Age 1864 year Nonsmoking Not take medication Non dieting ( weight stable prior 3 month ) BMI 1827 English literacy Do regularly consume breakfast Food allergy ingredient find study product BMI < 18 > 27 Diagnosed cardiovascular disease , renal disease , hepatic disease , diabetes mellitus Cancer previous 5 year Any gastrointestinal disease condition Recent bacterial infection ( < 3months ) Recent concurrent participation intervention research study History drug alcohol abuse prior 6 month Use lipid lowering , antihypertensive , antiinflammatory steroid medication Eating disorder Vegetarians People eat approximately 15 gram fiber per day Women pregnant lactate Women irregular menstrual cycle
